articles.author: Byron Kaye
articles.title: Australia fines Facebook owner Meta $14 mln for undisclosed data collection - Reuters
articles.description: An Australian court ordered Facebook owner Meta Platforms (META.O) to pay fines totalling A$20 million ($14 million) for collecting user data through a smartphone application adver…
articles.content: SYDNEY, July 26 (Reuters) - An Australian court ordered Facebook owner Meta Platforms (META.O) to pay fines totalling A$20 million ($14 million) for collecting user data through a smartphone applicat… [+2569 chars]
